edu.ncsu.csc216.course_manager.manager

Class CourseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.course_manager.manager.CourseManager

  • public class CourseManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the enrollment of Students in Courses.
    Author:
    Manaka Green

      • getCourseByName

        public Course getCourseByName(java.lang.String courseFileName)
        Finds a Course object in CourseManager's courses list by a name. Compares list of all courses from CourseManager's list to each student's list.
        Parameters:
        courseFileName - Course records file name
        Returns:
        c Course from student's list that equals the CourseManager's course list

      • loadStudents

        public void loadStudents(java.lang.String fileName)
        Accepts the file name for the Student records file and saves it to the field studentFileName.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of file from which you load students

        public void saveStudents()
        Writes the list of Students to the studentFileName.
